Symphonic Suite for Brass
Old Church Hall, Arbroath, Angus, Scotland, UK Held later than usual to celebrate the 650th anniversary of the Declaration of Arbroath in 1320. An additional regional qualifying contest was held on 1st March in the Usher Hall.
Deportment: Monktonhall Colliery
